negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.agentsmithv2

Class SmithModelV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.bayesianopponentmodel.OpponentModel
      • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.agentsmithv2.SmithModelV2

  • public class SmithModelV2
extends agents.bayesianopponentmodel.OpponentModel
    Highly optimized version of the Smith Frequency Model. The value weights are estimated based on frequency. The issue weights are calculated based on the distribution of the value weights.
    Author:
    Mark Hendrikx

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class agents.bayesianopponentmodel.OpponentModel

      Returns the utility of a bid, but instead of the normal utility it is based on the weights of each issues
